name: Fire Emblem: Gilmore Girls
overview: Monsters have invaded Stars Hollow, and it's up to our two favorite leading ladies to send them back to hell! In this 1-hour FE8 mod, play as that cast of characters we know and love from everyone's favorite TV show: Gilmore Girls! This mod features: - 4 custom maps - multiple playable characters - WITTY dialogue!!! (including mild swears) - Depictions of a normal mother-daughter relationship
